title: When will Clubs be fixed?
body: I'm the commander of a club that my friends and I are in. But all of them are actually in the club but when i'm on my account it shows that i'm not even in a club (But when they look at the club list it shows that I'm still the leader). Riot said they were having an issue with clubs a while back, and I'm wondering if anyone knows when they'll actually be fixed so I can manage my club and use it for its intentions?

replies.body:
We rolled out some fixes to clubs already, so we're dealing with any lingering issues on a case-by-case basis. If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll work with you further on this. Be sure to provide the Club name and tag with your submission.

Let me know if you have any questions.
